alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 7:08AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. John The Baptist, Ascension, northern St. James, southeastern West Baton Rouge, southern Livingston, Iberville, southern Tangipahoa, south central East Baton Rouge and northern Assumption Parishes through 800 AM CST... At 707 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Geismar, or near Gonzales, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Ponchatoula, Gramercy, Addis, Lutcher, Brusly, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Springfield, Westminster, Geismar and Bayou Sorrel. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 157 and 199. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 9, and between mile markers 46 and 51. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 15 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
